title: Font ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019042728im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Young_Blood_3548.jpg)

Any idea which font is this? Also, which fonts are similar to it, even without the 'B with the swash?
author: sasapetrova

comments.content:
it s Esquire typeface for Esquire UK.(-\>bpfoundry.com)  
will be release in 3 weight with many many (a lot of new) ligatures in spring 09

[www.bpfoundry.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019042728/http:/www.bpfoundry.com/ "www.bpfoundry.com")
